comments:
I've installed 3.2 Callisto .
Tried updating few plugins including WTP , everywhere at some or the other point getting the same alert box "update operation has failed" .

read some posts here and moved to 3.2.1
version is different. problem is same. no change.
Steps I follwed:
1.Software updates -> Find and install --> Search for new features to  install 
2.Click on New Remote site. give name as "subclipse" and URL is : http://subclipse.tigris.org/update/.
3.check subclipse and also "Ignore feature not applicable to this environment" and "Automatically select mirrors" click Finish.
4.select subclipse in features to install box.
5.complete installation procedures
6.update manager starts downloading.....
7.stuck at 60%. and alert box with title "problem occured" amd message is "update operation has failed".
8. No other choice click OK. nothing happens

Error Log message::
-------------------

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2006-10-18 15:56:41.718
!MESSAGE Error retrieving "plugins/org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.ui_1.0.0.jar". [Server returned HTTP response code: "403 Forbidden" for URL: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update/plugins/org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.ui_1.0.0.jar.]
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException: Server returned HTTP response code: "403 Forbidden" for URL: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update/plugins/org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.ui_1.0.0.jar.
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.checkConnectionResult(UpdateManagerUtils.java:560)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputSize(ContentReference.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:228)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.retrieveLocalJar(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getPluginEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:627)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:428)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:399)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 8 1 2006-10-18 15:58:18.843
!MESSAGE 


This is one sample.

I'm getting same problem with different error log messages for all plugins.

any work around for this??

Created an attachment (id=52203)
Update operation has failed

pls take this issue with update site provider (tigris?). If you look a the error:
"403 Forbidden" for URL:
http://subclipse.tigris.org/update/plugins/org.tigris.subversion.subclipse.ui_1.0.0.jar.]
They obviously have problem with privileges on the server. Nothing that client can resolve.
